THREE commander on a battlefield to whom thousands of new and brilliant ideas occur which there is hardly time to put in action seeing Pierre, touched his sleeve with her finger, saying: 
"Wait a bit, I have something in view for you this evening." (She glanced at Hdene and smiled at her.) "My dear Hlne, be charitable to my poor aunt who adores you. Go and keep her company for ten minutes. And that it will not be too dull, here is the dear count who will not refuse to accompa
